CONTACT_FORM_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Have a question or need assistance? Fill out the form below.
CONTACT_FORM_TEXT_FIELD_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: How did you hear about us?
TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER: Book lovers across the world rave about our app
TESTIMONIAL_1_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: This app is a book worm's dream come true! The vast selection and easy checkout process make building my library a breeze.
TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: As someone who is always on the go, I love how convenient it is to purchase books from my phone. The app is so user-friendly!
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: I've discovered so many amazing books thanks to the personalized recommendations. This app just gets my reading taste!
FEATURE_1_BODY: Explore our enormous catalog featuring millions of books across every genre imaginable.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Our smart algorithms learn your reading preferences to suggest titles you'll love.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Shop with confidence using our secure payment gateway and trusted payment partners.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Download eBooks seamlessly to your preferred device for reading on-the-go.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Read authentic reviews from fellow book lovers to make informed purchases.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Easily create and manage wishlists to keep track of books you want to read next.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_1: How does the book purchasing process work?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: Simply browse our extensive book catalog, add titles to your cart, and proceed to checkout. We accept all major payment methods for a secure and convenient transaction.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: Do you offer discounts or promotions?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: Yes, we frequently run discounts, promotional codes, and bundle deals. Sign up for our newsletter to stay updated on the latest offers and sales.
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: We have a hassle-free 30-day return policy. If you're not satisfied with your purchase for any reason, you can return the book for a full refund or exchange.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: How quickly will my order arrive?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: Order processing and shipping times may vary, but we strive to get your books to you as quickly as possible. Expedited shipping options are available at checkout for a fee.
FAQ_TITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Frequently Asked Questions About Our Book Buying App
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Get answers to common queries about using our convenient book purchasing platform.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_1: How do I find and purchase books?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Our app has a powerful search engine that lets you easily find books by title, author, genre, or keyword. Once you've found a book you want, just click 'Buy Now' to seamlessly purchase and have it shipped right to your door.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: What payment methods do you accept?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and other popular digital payment platforms for maximum convenience when checking out.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: How long will it take to receive my order?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: Standard shipping times are 5-7 business days within the continental United States. Expedited shipping options are available at checkout for faster delivery.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: Can I return or exchange a book?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: Absolutely. We have a generous 30-day return policy on all book purchases. Just initiate a return through your account and follow the easy instructions.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: Do you sell e-books or just physical books?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Our app currently focuses on new physical book sales, but we plan to expand to offer e-book versions of many titles in the near future as well.
